about_the_game:
Dive into thrilling team conflicts in an action-packed Hero Shooter incorporating unique MOBA elements. Customize your hero combat style with a singular card system. Control key zones, gather resources, and steal essence from enemy bases to claim victory for your squad. Join The Harvest!


Gear up your hero through the card system to define your combat style, jump into the battle and dominate the battlefield!



The Harvest goes beyond the common class systems in the shooter genre thanks to the Class-Based Card System. Choose your Hero, select your card loadout, and modify your build in real-time during battle. Level up your cards by winning matches and improve your performance in the final battle for the essence!





In The Harvest, teamwork is rewarded, so all your teammates will benefit from the resources you get. Control the key zones of the map to gather enough resources, defeat enemies and monsters to increase your power, and be the last team standing!





O’Ree-Jin is an uninhabited planet that contains the remains of an ancient civilization that controlled the most precious substance in all of creation, the Essence.
The planet is a zealous protector of the Essence but is at times vulnerable to outside threats.
Aware of these openings in the planet’s defenses, different civilizations from the Galaxy send their best Heroes to fight for the Essence. This event is known as "The Harvest".






The Harvest is a new IP created from scratch with deep lore. It has different civilizations, heroes, conflicts, risk-taking and, maybe, chivalric romance in its background.
Discover all the stories about each Hero, their civilizations, and their motivations to risk their lives in The Harvest. Find your most suitable Hero among the different civilizations in this new space opera and get ready for THE HARVEST!




  • A new class-based hero-shooter.
  • Play in your way! +132 available cards to create your own play style.
  • Improve your skills and stats during combat through the card system.
  • Choose your gameplay from different Heroes.
  • Squads of 3 Heroes.
  • 12 players per match.
  • A new and rich sci-fi universe.

content_descriptors.notes: The game shows the violence of a slightly more graphic nature towards fantasy characters or non-realistic violence towards human-like characters.

detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Dive into thrilling team conflicts in an action-packed Hero Shooter incorporating unique MOBA elements. Customize your hero combat style with a singular card system. Control key zones, gather resources, and steal essence from enemy bases to claim victory for your squad. Join The Harvest!


Gear up your hero through the card system to define your combat style, jump into the battle and dominate the battlefield!

legal_notice:
Welcome to our game!

When you open the game for the first time, we capture your IP address and your Steam ID in order to provide you with the best gaming experience possible. We take data protection seriously and wish to assure you that all applicable data protection rules will be followed in the handling of this information. If you have any questions or issues about how we are using your information, please contact us at contact@falco.gg.
name: The Harvest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / Core i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580, or Intel ARC A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Dive into thrilling team conflicts in an action-packed Hero Shooter incorporating unique MOBA elements. Customize your hero combat style with a singular card system. Control key zones, gather resources, and steal essence from enemy bases to claim victory for your squad. Join The Harvest!
